meanings.definition: A movable indicator on a computer screen used to show the position for data entry or to indicate a point that can be manipulated.
meanings.sent1: The cursor blinked on the screen, waiting for me to type my name.
meanings.sent2: I moved the cursor with the mouse to click on the link.
meanings.sent3: The cursor seemed to have a mind of its own, dancing around the document.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes followed the cursor as it scrolled through the webpage.
meanings.sent5: The blinking cursor was like a tiny guide showing me where to type.

meanings.definition: A transparent slide engraved with a hairline, used for sighting or measuring.
meanings.sent1: He adjusted the cursor on the slide to align with the target.
meanings.sent2: The cursor on the transparent slide helped in precise measurements.
meanings.sent3: The cursor on the slide felt like a tiny explorer on a quest for accuracy.
meanings.sent4: She used the cursor to pinpoint the exact location on the map.
meanings.sent5: The cursor on the slide was like a tiny detective solving the mystery of measurements.
